author: Voorhis Les
content: My wife and have changed to a Carnivore about 60 days or so ago with great results! However we are still taking our supplements as we are concerned about getting the right and proper vitamins and minerals that we know are present in organ meats. That being said, we HATE organ meats. Weâ€™ve tried various recipes, mixing them with other foods etc. and just have not developed a taste for them. Thoughts and ideas or do we have to settle for the reality of taking supplements to fill in gaps were missing?
